keyMoments.title: Robin Questions Neptune About Joy Boy
keyMoments.description: Robin privately questions King Neptune about Joy Boy and the poneglyph she discovered in the Sea Forest, learning about his connection to Fish-Man Island during the Void Century.
keyMoments.significance: Robin's archaeological knowledge allows her to uncover crucial historical information that connects multiple story threads.
keyMoments.quote: Joy Boy was a man from the surface who lived during the Void Century.

keyMoments.title: Robin Deduces Shirahoshi is Poseidon
keyMoments.description: By connecting information from the Skypiea poneglyph with Shirahoshi's ability to command Sea Kings, Robin deduces that Shirahoshi is the ancient weapon Poseidon.
keyMoments.significance: One of Robin's most important archaeological discoveries, revealing one of the three ancient weapons and demonstrating her crucial role in uncovering the world's hidden history.
keyMoments.quote: Shirahoshi has inherited that same ability, which means she has also inherited that name. Your daughter is the ancient weapon Poseidon.

reveals.information: Deduced that Shirahoshi is the ancient weapon Poseidon by connecting the Skypiea poneglyph information with Shirahoshi's ability to command Sea Kings
Learned about Joy Boy's broken promise to Fish-Man Island during the Void Century and his connection to the ship Noah

keyMoments.title: Neptune Reveals Joy Boy's History
keyMoments.description: Neptune explains to Robin that Joy Boy was a figure from the surface world during the Void Century who made a promise to Fish-Man Island but was unable to keep it, leaving an apology on the poneglyph.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals crucial information about Joy Boy and the ancient history of Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.quote: Joy Boy was a man from the surface who lived during the Void Century. He made a promise to the people of Fish-Man Island, but for some reason, he was unable to keep it.

keyMoments.title: Neptune Explains the Promise to Protect Noah
keyMoments.description: Neptune reveals that the royal family has protected the ship Noah for centuries, waiting for someone to fulfill Joy Boy's promise, though the ship's true purpose remains unknown.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the royal family's ancient duty and connects Noah to Joy Boy's unfulfilled promise.
keyMoments.quote: Our ancestors promised to watch over Noah until the appointed time. Only when that time comes will Noah's true purpose be revealed.

keyMoments.title: Neptune Confirms Shirahoshi is Poseidon
keyMoments.description: Neptune confirms Robin's deduction that Shirahoshi is the ancient weapon Poseidon, expressing concern about what this means for his daughter's safety.
keyMoments.significance: Confirms one of the most significant revelations in the series and shows Neptune's burden as both king and father.
keyMoments.quote: Her power awakened that day when the Sea Kings came to stop Noah. I'm afraid this is not a good thing for Shirahoshi.

relationships.description: Neptune is Shirahoshi's father and is deeply protective of her, especially after learning she is the ancient weapon Poseidon.

evolutionMoments.description: Neptune confirms to Robin that Shirahoshi is Poseidon and expresses concern for her safety.

reveals.information: Revealed that Joy Boy was from the surface world during the Void Century and made a promise to Fish-Man Island
Confirmed that Shirahoshi is the ancient weapon Poseidon
The royal family has protected Noah for centuries as part of an ancient promise

keyMoments.title: Shirahoshi Revealed as Ancient Weapon Poseidon
keyMoments.description: Robin deduces and Neptune confirms that Shirahoshi is the current incarnation of the ancient weapon Poseidon, possessing the ability to command Sea Kings.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Shirahoshi as one of the three ancient weapons, making her one of the most important characters in the world despite her gentle nature.

abilities.description: The ability to communicate with and command Sea Kings, making her the ancient weapon Poseidon.

relationships.description: Shirahoshi is Neptune's daughter and the princess of Ryugu Kingdom.

reveals.information: Revealed to be the ancient weapon Poseidon
Her ability to command Sea Kings fully awakened during the recent crisis when she summoned them to stop Noah

keyMoments.title: Jinbe Postpones Joining the Straw Hat Crew
keyMoments.description: Luffy formally invites Jinbe to join the Straw Hat Pirates, but Jinbe declines for now, citing unfinished obligations while promising to join in the future.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Jinbe's eventual recruitment while establishing his sense of honor and responsibility to complete his current commitments.
keyMoments.quote: I have some things I must take care of first. But when the time comes, if you'll still have me, I'd be honored to join your crew.

relationships.description: Jinbe respects Luffy greatly and promises to join his crew once his obligations are fulfilled.

evolutionMoments.description: Jinbe declines Luffy's crew invitation but promises to join in the future.

reveals.information: Postponed joining the Straw Hat Pirates due to unfinished obligations

keyMoments.title: Maria Napole's Performance
keyMoments.description: Maria Napole, a famous ocean floor diva, performs at the banquet celebrating the Straw Hats' victory over the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Adds cultural richness to Fish-Man Island and showcases the celebratory atmosphere.

reveals.information: Famous ocean floor diva who performs at royal events
